Actually, JP, Megs was never given the codes. KitKat, Darkmouse, and 
Magnus are the only ones I know that have control of the base.

::Killfest::

Killfest growls as he recieves Megatron's transmission. That bot 
didn't know what he was getting into. He looks at Darkmouse.

"Scramble the codes so only you have access," he syas. Darkmouse nods 
and does as told.

"Excellent. Can you put the engine room on complete lockdown? I want 
it airtight."

Darkmouse nods, tapping a few buttons. There's a slight groan as 
every vent, door, etc closed and shut. Another tap of a button, and 
the engines shut down, along with all the computers in the area.

"Now, Megatron," Killfest says over his comm, directly to the 
tyrant, "You are completely cut off. Releasing gasses now would only 
affect yourself. I don't suggest trying to do anything now, I can 
open a vent and pump NCG to your position in a second."

He motions for Blacknightmare to stop talking to Hell Beast. "I await 
your surrender, Megatron," he says into his comm.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Hell Beast, "Youre going to have to explain it a little 
more...Im 
> loseing patience. Tell me what you want instead of these insesint 
little 
> games!" He roared.
